shortdesc.ph: The configuration for advanced features of the RTMP or RTMPS streaming with transcoding.

section.p: If you want to enable the advanced features of streaming with transcoding, contact .

plentry.pd: The feature names, including LBHQ (high-quality video with a lower bitrate) and VEO (optimized video encoder).

Whether to enable the advanced features of streaming with transcoding:
: Enable the advanced features.
: (Default) Do not enable the advanced features.
